inclusion.criterion: Start of jaundice at a chronological age greater than 48 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Knowledge of blood groups of mother and child
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parents are required to sign informed consent where they agree to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Extensive skin lesions due to burns or sloughing at the physical examination prior to entering the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Parents without availability to stay in the Kangaroo Mother Care Program for at least 6 hours
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
